modName: M Bison YES - Level Up Sound Replacer
summary: The vanilla level up music was incredibly over dramatic, so this just seemed necessary. M Bison\'s Quote from the Street Fighter cartoon. \"YES! YES!\"
descriptionHtml:
The vanilla level up music was incredibly over dramatic, so this just seemed necessary. M Bison\'s Quote from the Street Fighter cartoon. \"YES! YES!\"

Source: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P3ALwKeSEYs

Installation:
Simply unzip to desktop and then drop the Data file into the C:\\Program File\\Steam\\steamapps\\commons\\skyrim, and then select to merge with the existing data file.
author: Demiyqxzurge
